00056 /*! Floating point coordinates */
00057 struct FCOORD {
00058         float fx; /*! The X coordinate */
00059         float fy; /*! The Y coordinate */
00060 };
00061 
00062 /*! Coordinates to define a grid */
00063 struct FRECT {
00064         FCOORD ul; /*! Upper left coordinate */
00065         FCOORD ur; /*! Upper right coordinate */
00066         FCOORD ll; /*! Lower left coordinate */
00067         FCOORD lr; /*! Lower right coordinate */
00068 };
00069 
00070 /*! Name value parameters. */
00071 typedef std::map<std::string,std::string> StrStrMap;
00072 
00073 /*! An STL vector of grid coordinates. */
00074 typedef std::vector<FRECT> FRECTArray;
00075 
00076 /*! This class provides storage capabilities for the GRD file header. */
00077 class CGRDFileHeaderData
00078 {
00079 protected:
00080         /*! The file version number. */
00081         float m_Version;
00082 
00083         /*! The number of columns of features on the array. */
00084         uint32_t m_nCols;
00085 
00086         /*! The number of rows of features on the array. */
00087         uint32_t m_nRows;
00088 
00089         /*! The feature pitch in the X direction. */
00090         float m_fFeaturePitchX;
00091 
00092         /*! The feature pitch in the Y direction. */
00093         float m_fFeaturePitchY;
00094 
00095         /*! The feature setback in the X direction. */
00096         float m_fFeatureSetbackX;
00097 
00098         /*! The feature setback in the Y direction. */
00099         float m_fFeatureSetbackY;
00100 
00101         /*! A map of parameter name/value pairs. */
00102         StrStrMap m_props;
00103 
00104         /*! The number of columns of features on the array. */
00105         FRECTArray m_optSubgridCoords;
00106 
00107         /*! The size of the header in bytes. */
00108         uint32_t m_nHeaderBytes;
00109 
00110         /*! Friend to the high level file class. This allows the class
00111          * to set the protected members thus making this a read-only
00112          * class.
00113          */
00114         friend class CGRDFileData;
00115 
00116 public:
00117         /*! Constructor */
00118         CGRDFileHeaderData();
00119 
00120         /*! Gets the version number of the file.
00121          * @return The version number of the file.
00122          */
00123         float GetVersion() const { return m_Version; }
00124 
00125         /*! Sets the version number of the file.
00126          *      @param value The version number of the file.
00127          */
00128         void SetVersion(float value) { m_Version = value; }
00129 
00130         /*! Gets the number of columns of features on the array.
00131          * @return The number of columns of features on the array.
00132          */
00133         uint32_t GetCols() const { return m_nCols; }
00134 
00135         /*! Sets the number of columns of features on the array.
00136          *      @param value The number of columns of features on the array.
00137          */
00138         void SetCols(uint32_t value) { m_nCols = value; }
00139 
00140         /*! Gets the number of rows of features on the array.
00141          * @return The number of rows of features on the array.
00142          */
00143         uint32_t GetRows() const { return m_nRows; }
00144 
00145         /*! Sets the number of rows of features on the array.
00146          *      @param value The number of rows of features on the array.
00147          */
00148         void SetRows(uint32_t value) { m_nRows = value; }
00149 
00150         /*! Gets the number of features on the array.
00151          * @return The number of features on the array.
00152          */
00153         uint32_t GetNumCells() const { return m_nRows*m_nCols; }
00154 
00155         /*! Gets the feature pitch in the X direction.
00156          * @return The feature pitch in the X direction.
00157          */
00158         float GetFeaturePitchX() const { return m_fFeaturePitchX; }
00159 
00160         /*! Sets the feature pitch in the X direction.
00161          *      @param value The feature pitch in the X direction.
00162          */
00163         void SetFeaturePitchX(float value) { m_fFeaturePitchX = value; }
00164 
00165         /*! Gets the feature pitch in the Y direction.
00166          * @return The feature pitch in the Y direction.
00167          */
00168         float GetFeaturePitchY() const { return m_fFeaturePitchY; }
00169 
00170         /*! Sets the feature pitch in the Y direction.
00171          *      @param value The feature pitch in the Y direction.
00172          */
00173         void SetFeaturePitchY(float value) { m_fFeaturePitchY = value; }
00174 
00175         /*! Gets the feature setback in the X direction.
00176          * @return The feature setback in the X direction.
00177          */
00178         float GetFeatureSetbackX() const { return m_fFeatureSetbackX; }
00179 
00180         /*! Sets the feature setback in the X direction.
00181          *      @param value The feature setback in the X direction.
00182          */
00183         void SetFeatureSetbackX(float value) { m_fFeatureSetbackX = value; }
00184 
00185         /*! Gets the feature setback in the Y direction.
00186          * @return The feature setback in the Y direction.
00187          */
00188         float GetFeatureSetbackY() const { return m_fFeatureSetbackY; }
00189 
00190         /*! Sets the feature setback in the Y direction.
00191          *      @param value The feature setback in the Y direction.
00192          */
00193         void SetFeatureSetbackY(float value) { m_fFeatureSetbackY = value; }
00194 
00195         /*! Gets the number of sub-grids.
00196          * @return The number of sub-grids.
00197          */
00198         uint32_t GetNumSubgrids() const { return (uint32_t) m_optSubgridCoords.size(); }
00199 
00200         /*! Gets the optimized coordinates of a sub-grid.
00201          * @param nIndex The index to the sub-grid of interest.
00202          * @return The sub-grid.
00203          */
00204         FRECT GetOptSubgrid(int nIndex) { return m_optSubgridCoords[nIndex]; }
00205 
00206         /*! Add the optimized coordinates of a sub-grid.
00207          *      @param subgrid The optimized subgrid coordinates.
00208          *      @return Returns true if the subgrid was successfully added.
00209          */
00210          bool AddOptSubgrid(FRECT* subgrid) { if (subgrid == NULL) return false; m_optSubgridCoords.push_back(*subgrid); return true;}
00211 
00212          /*! Remove all optimized subgrid coordinates.
00213           */
00214          void RemoveOptSubgrids() { m_optSubgridCoords.clear(); }
00215 
00216         /*! Gets the parameter name/value pairs as a map.
00217          * @return The parameters.
00218          */
00219         StrStrMap &GetParameters() { return m_props; }
00220 };
00221 
00222 /*! This class provide parsing and storage capabilities for the GRD files. */
00223 class CGRDFileData  
00224 {
00225 public:
00226         /*! Constructor */
00227         CGRDFileData();
00228 
00229         /*! Destructor */
00230         ~CGRDFileData();
00231 
00232         /*! Sets the file name parameters.
00233          * @param str The full path to the GRD file.
00234          */
00235         void SetFileName(const char *str) { m_FileName = str; }
00236 
00237         /*! Gets the file name.
00238          * @return The full path of the GRD file.
00239          */
00240         std::string GetFileName() const { return m_FileName; }
00241 
00242         /*! Gets the error message associated with a read error.
00243          *  @return The error message.
00244          */ 
00245         std::string GetError() const { return m_strError; }
00246 
00247         /*! Gets the header.
00248          * @return The header object.
00249          */
00250         CGRDFileHeaderData &GetHeader() { return m_HeaderData; }
00251 
00252         /*! Gets the center position for the given feature.
00253          * @param x The feature X coordinate.
00254          * @param y The feature Y coordinate.
00255          * @return The center position.
00256          */
00257         FCOORD GetCenter( int x, int y );
00258 
00259         /*! Checks if the file exists.
00260          * @return True if exists.
00261          */
00262         bool Exists();
00263 
00264         /*! Reads the contents of the GRD file.
00265          * @return True if successful.
00266          */
00267         bool Read();
00268 
00269         /*! Closes the file. The data is not accessible after the file is closed. */
00270         void Close();
00271 
00272 protected:
00273         /*! Opens the file.
00274          * @return True if successful.
00275          */
00276         bool Open();
00277 
00278         /*! Reads the header of the file using memory mapping. 
00279          * @param pData The memory mapped data pointer.
00280          * @return True if successful.
00281          */
00282         bool ReadHeader(char *pData);
00283 
00284         /*! Reads the the fixed part of the header.
00285          * @param pData The memory mapped data pointer.
00286          * @return True if successful.
00287          */
00288         bool ReadFixedHeader(char* pData );
00289 
00290         /*! Reads the name/value parameters from the header.
00291          * @param pData The memory mapped data pointer.
00292          * @return True if successful.
00293          */
00294         bool ReadTagHeader(char *pData);
00295 
00296         /*! Reads the optimum corners from the header.
00297          * @param pData The memory mapped data pointer.
00298          * @return True if successful.
00299          */
00300         bool ReadOptimumCornerHeader(char* pData);
00301 
00302         /*! A pointer to the memory mapped file. */
00303         void  *m_lpFileMap;
00304 
00305         /*! A pointer to the memory mapped file. */
00306         char  *m_lpData;
00307 
00308 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00309 
00310         /*! A file handle. */
00311         HANDLE m_hFileMap;
00312 
00313         /*! Windows handle to the file. */
00314         HANDLE m_hFile;
00315 
00316 #else
00317 
00318         /*! File pointer for memory mapping. */
00319         FILE *m_fp;
00320 
00321         /*! The size of the file. */
00322         int m_MapLen;
00323 
00324 #endif
00325 
00326         /*! Flag indicating if the file is open. */
00327         bool m_bFileOpen;
00328 
00329         /*! Flag indicating if the file is memory mapped. */
00330         bool m_bFileMapped;
00331 
00332         /*! An string to hold error message upon read failures. */ 
00333         std::string m_strError;
00334 
00335         /*! The file name. */
00336         std::string m_FileName;
00337 
00338         /*! The file header. */
00339         CGRDFileHeaderData m_HeaderData;
00340 };
00341 
00342 };
